attributes.action: Reverse the decision by the House of Lords to refuse to compensate those suffering with pleural plaques, following wrongful exposure to asbestos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This decision will affect hundreds of people, who have to live with the constant and disabling fear that they will develop a fatal condition as a result of the wrongful exposure to asbestos dust. It is suggested that psychiatric injury coupled with the scarring of the lung should become actionable.
